title: Ticketmaster Announces Holiday Ticket Sale
description: Fans can up to 50% off on select concerts. Ticketmaster Announces Holiday Ticket Sale Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Ticketmaster has announced a special ticket sale for Christmas and the holidays, offering fans a chance to sale up to 50% off on select concerts.
text: Ticketmaster has announced a series of special holiday promotions offering major discounts on tickets. Beginning Black Friday through December 31st, fans can take advantage of the following three deals: — Two-For-One: Save 50% off when you buy two tickets (excluding fees). Use offer code TMN241 at checkout. — Half Off: Save up to 50% off select tickets by using code TMNTX at checkout. — Me Plus Three: Save on 4-pack tickets to select events. Look for Me+3 4 Pack in Ticket Type at checkout. At first glance, there are a number of noteworthy shows included as part of the Black Friday promotion, including  Goose, Boyz II Men, Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert, Jennifer Hudson, Kevin Hart, Bright Eyes, Explosions in the Sky, Melissa Etheridge, Dropkick Murphys, Indigo Girls, Umphrey’s McGee, Pigeons Playing Ping Ping, Thee Sacred Souls, and Tim Heidecker, among others. Fans can also save on a number of sporting events, children’s shows, and Las Vegas residencies. Get more details here. Also: Amazon Music Unlimited is offering a three-month free trial. Listen to 100 million songs and podcasts, ad-free and in high-definition, plus Audible integration.
html:
Ticketmaster has announced a series of special holiday promotions offering major discounts on tickets.

Beginning Black Friday through December 31st, fans can take advantage of the following three deals:

— Two-For-One: Save 50% off when you buy two tickets (excluding fees). Use offer code TMN241 at checkout.

— Half Off: Save up to 50% off select tickets by using code TMNTX at checkout.

— Me Plus Three: Save on 4-pack tickets to select events. Look for Me+3 4 Pack in Ticket Type at checkout.

At first glance, there are a number of noteworthy shows included as part of the Black Friday promotion, including  Goose, Boyz II Men, Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert, Jennifer Hudson, Kevin Hart, Bright Eyes, Explosions in the Sky, Melissa Etheridge, Dropkick Murphys, Indigo Girls, Umphrey’s McGee, Pigeons Playing Ping Ping, Thee Sacred Souls, and Tim Heidecker, among others. Fans can also save on a number of sporting events, children’s shows, and Las Vegas residencies. Get more details here.

Also: Amazon Music Unlimited is offering a three-month free trial. Listen to 100 million songs and podcasts, ad-free and in high-definition, plus Audible integration.
